page.title: 25Lord Dowding remembered
page.content:
There is now a sandstone monument to Lord Dowding in Station Park. Each year on the Sunday nearest to his date of birth, a memorial service is held to commemorate his life. The service includes a flypast, Pipe Band, a tribute and a wreath laying ceremony. The next such event will be on Sunday 11 Sepember 2011 at 1430 hours.
Mairlyn Elliott
